TopicTitle: Even more planes from Ace of spades! (BluPlanet Inc)

Articles.Content:
Another pack of planes from builder Ace of spades! Like last time, also a rover as a bonus.

Introducing Mt-1, you're new slave. Wait what? It'll crush your unwanted cars (or in most cases, itself), race the nyan cat, even self destruct!

Due to numerous complaints and refunds, the policy has changed so now the warranty is immediately ineffective if box is opened. Use at your own risk.

Next up, the UAV-1, a top market drone so you can spy on your most hated nemesis (Bill). This slim, sleek craft is powered by ant engines.

It also dusts crops and picks your kerbals' noses (in which case refunds will no longer be possible)!

Now for the SR-71 Blackbird (or is it whitebird?), top notch spy plane for keeping an eye on your worst enemy (Bill). It won't take off until you're about to crash into the ocean...but no worries right? (If it gets wet, no refunds)

Lastly, I present the P-38 Lightning, modeled after the World War II fighter. It can act a bit weird in some cases, such as not accelerating unless you pitch up. Notes: Buy one for the price of two and get one free! What an amazing deal!!!

Downloads:

-MT-1: https://www.dropbox.com/s/uqi59wzqzpha0f5/Rover%20MT-1.craft

-UAV-1: https://www.dropbox.com/s/7rjokspuhwse0l8/Plane%20UAV-1.craft

-SR-71: https://www.dropbox.com/s/95rvv7dtgpm9q1u/Plane%20SR-71%20Blackbird.craft

-P-38: https://www.dropbox.com/s/utouf54duzb21qf/Plane%20P-38%20Lightning.craft

Thank ace of spades for his hard work!
